profile: The Vacuum Specialists began as a small store formerly known as South West Vacuums in the SW quadrant of Calgary. In 1985, we opened our second location in the NW quadrant of the city. In 2005, we designed a unique showroom that now serves as our head office on the corner of Centre Street and 30th Ave. Four years later, we opened our third location in Airdrie at the Luxstone Plaza. Today, we continue to focus on serving our customers well and are proud to be the exclusive dealer of many large brands of central and portable residential and commercial vacuums.
service_area:
Servicing Calgary and surrounding areas
Calgary - Airdrie - Cochrane - Chestermere - High River -
products:
Vacuum Specialists offers the following top brands of Residential Cleaning Equipment and Accessories: Eureka, Dyson, iRobot, Sebo, Karcher, Miele, Dirt Devil, Johnny Vac, Airstream, Hizero, Readivac, Hoover, Perfect, Sirena Water Vacuum, Riccar, Simplicity, Royal, Panasonic, Oreck, Soniclean, Lindhaus, Vapore, Lady Bug, Reliable, Vapamore, among many others. Vacuum Specialists offers the following top brands of Industrial/Commercial Cleaning Equipment and Accessories: Sebo, Karcher, Ninja (E-Steam), Sanitaire, Riccar, Stanley, Makita, Mighty Mouth, Carpet Pro, Nacecare, Simplicity, Smooth Air (Husky), Nilfisk, Ghibli, Targa, Numatic, Jet CleanMax, among many others.
Trust the Vacuum Specialists for all your Residential and Commercial Cleaning needs.
services: Since 1970, Vacuum Specialists has been faithfully serving Calgary and surrounding areas as the top choice for servicing and repairing Vacuums, Cleaning Equipment, and Janitorial Equipment. Our success has always been driven by exceptional customer service and our commitment to delivering quality work.
